```{r}
if (requery == TRUE) 
  {
    term <- "nuclear+energy" # Need to use + to string together separate words
    begin_date <- "20210101"
    end_date <- "20220101"
    desk_loc <- 'news_desk:("Energy")ANDglocations:("U.S")'
    
    #construct the query url using API operators
    baseurl <- paste0("http://api.nytimes.com/svc/search/v2/articlesearch.json?q=", term,
                      "&begin_date=",begin_date, "&end_date=", end_date, "&", desk_loc,
                      "&facet_filter=true&api-key=", "cqRVqR7OxTbIN7WkN9GJ3DgGsEbMI2cR",
                      sep = "") 
    
    
    initialQuery <- fromJSON(baseurl)
    maxPages <- round((initialQuery$response$meta$hits[1] / 10) - 1) 
    
    pages <- list()
    for (i in 0:maxPages) 
      {
        nytSearch <- fromJSON(paste0(baseurl, "&page=", i), flatten = TRUE) %>%
          data.frame() 
        message("Retrieving page ", i)
        pages[[i+1]] <- nytSearch 
        Sys.sleep(6) 
    }
    class(nytSearch)
    
    df <- rbind_pages(pages)
  
    saveRDS(df, here("data", "nyt_nuclear_energy.RDS"))
}

#df <- readRDS(here("data", "nyt_nuclear_power.RDS"))
```
